title: Friday (20) declared a holiday for State & State-approved private schools
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Education Ministry has declared the 20th of May as a holiday for all government and government-approved private schools.
Schools will re-open on the 6th of June 2022, following the conclusion of the G. C. E. Ordinary Level Examination.
Happy to have created a peaceful country: Gen. Shavendra Silva
